payload.name: Crepes Ala Carte

payload.address: 993 North Point St San Francisco, CA 94109

meh: The decor in the place could use some upgrading on the walls, maybe add some color? Nothing stood out to me

neg: The 5 shrimps "al ajillo" made with canned chopped garlic, the ceviche made out of one kind of fish (cheap, no other option were to choose from) covered in lemon so the "leche de tigre" wasn't balanced at all

When I asked what fish it was made with they told me (basa; cheap fish) and had no other option available
pos: Great prices, right next to Ghirardelli square
